morningBrief.headline: The Mountain Got a Touch-Up
morningBrief.body: Overnight dusting of 1" means the hardpack got a makeover. Nearly full mountain access with 117 of 123 trails spinning. Snow showers in the forecast with a few inches expected. Conditions should improve.

morningBrief.headline: A Little Sugar on Top
morningBrief.body: A light refresh of 1" overnight makes the groomers smoother. A little something coming our way. Light snow expected to dust things up.

morningBrief.headline: The Whole Mountain Awaits
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 9" over the last week. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays.

morningBrief.headline: Storm Cycle Building
morningBrief.body: 63/64 trails spinning, 51 freshly groomed. Cloudy. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. The weather models are locked in: 6" of snow heading our way.

morningBrief.headline: Snow in the Forecast
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 9" over the last week. Snow is in the cards for the next few days. Enough to freshen things up.

morningBrief.headline: Major System Approaching
morningBrief.body: 141 of 144 trails are open with 83 groomed. Windy with a temperatures TBD. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Winter has more to say. 6" forecasted means conditions improving soon.

morningBrief.headline: A Refresh Is Coming
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 8" over the last week. Nearly full mountain access with 85 of 85 trails spinning. Snow is in the cards for the next few days. Enough to freshen things up.

morningBrief.headline: The Forecast Looks Loaded
morningBrief.body: 1" fell while you were sleeping. The bumps are softer, groomers are primo. Storm cycle alert! 9" on the way. Conditions are about to level up.
